text: James John Benzelock (born June 21, 1947) is a former professional ice hockey right winger. He was drafted in the first round, fifth overall, by the Minnesota North Stars in the 1968 NHL Amateur Draft. He never played in the National Hockey League; however, he appeared in 166 World Hockey Association games with the Alberta Oilers, Chicago Cougars, and Quebec Nordiques. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Manitoba Category:International Hockey League (1945â€“2001) players Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Winnipeg Jets (WHL) players Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Jim Benzelock
